info.description: Check advertising eligibility of global offers.
info.title: Eligibility

post.summary: Gets advertising eligibility status for a list of products.
post.description:
Gets a list of advertising eligibility objects for a set of products. Requests are permitted only for products sold by the merchant associated with the profile. Note that the request object is a list of ASINs, but multiple SKUs are returned if there is more than one SKU associated with an ASIN. If a product is not eligible for advertising, the response includes an object describing the reasons for ineligibility.

**Requires one of these permissions**:
["advertiser_campaign_edit","advertiser_campaign_view"]

422.description: Unprocessable entity. The request was understood, but it contained invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized. Request failed because user is not authenticated or is not allowed to invoke the operation.

500.description: Internal server error. Retry later. Contact support if this response persists.

403.description: Forbidden. Request failed because user does not have access to a specified resource

404.description: Cannot find requested entity. Note that this may occur if a product is not associated with the given profile/merchant, or a product is no longer in the catalog.

429.description: Too many requests. The request was rate-limited. Retry later.

parameters.name: Amazon-Advertising-API-ClientId
parameters.description: The identifier of a client associated with a "Login with Amazon" account.

parameters.name: Amazon-Advertising-API-Scope
parameters.description: The identifier of a profile associated with the advertiser account. Use `GET` method on Profiles resource to list profiles associated with the access token passed in the HTTP Authorization header.

post.description: Checks the advertiser's eligibility to ad programs.

reasons.description: Advertiser has no known relations to a brand.
Advertiser has no known relations to a brand.
Advertiser has no known relations to a brand.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Specify the language in which the response is returned.

schema.description:
The header used to pass global account associated with the advertiser account
Use `GET` method on the Global Ads Account resource to list the global ads account associated with the access token passed in the HTTP Authorization header and choose AdvertisingAccountIdentifier id from the response to pass it as input.
Use for v2 global calls

parameters.name: Amazon-Ads-AccountId
parameters.description:
The header used to pass global account associated with the advertiser account
Use `GET` method on the Global Ads Account resource to list the global ads account associated with the access token passed in the HTTP Authorization header and choose AdvertisingAccountIdentifier id from the response to pass it as input.
Use for v2 global calls

schema.description: The identifier of a client associated with a "Login with Amazon" account.

parameters.name: Amazon-Advertising-API-ClientId
parameters.description: The identifier of a client associated with a "Login with Amazon" account.

schema.description: The identifier of a profile associated with the advertiser account. Use `GET` method on Profiles resource to list profiles associated with the access token passed in the HTTP Authorization header and choose profile id `profileId` from the response to pass it as input.

parameters.name: Amazon-Advertising-API-Scope
parameters.description: The identifier of a profile associated with the advertiser account. Use `GET` method on Profiles resource to list profiles associated with the access token passed in the HTTP Authorization header and choose profile id `profileId` from the response to pass it as input.

schema.description: The content type of the request.

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: The content type of the request.

ProgramEligibilityResponseContent.description: An object of program eligibility responses for an advertiser.

Check.description: A union of all the checks that we would want to skip

EligibilityStatus.description: The advertising eligibility status of a product.

severity.description: An enumerated advertising eligibility severity status. If set to `INELIGIBLE`, the product cannot be included in an advertisement. If set to `ELIGIBLE_WITH_WARNING`, the product may not receive impressions when included in an advertisement.

helpUrl.description: A URL with additional information about the status identifier. May not be present for all status identifiers.

message.description: A human-readable description of the status identifier specified in the `name` field.

marketplaceId.description:
The marketplace to check the feature access in (Can be obfuscated or not)
Especially useful for global requests

resource.description: The advertising resource of which you wish to check feature access for. Example: Sponsored Display Campaign.

action.description: the action to be performed on the resource

ProgramEligibilityRequestContent.description: A request to evaluate account level eligibility for Amazon ad programs (Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, Sponsored Display, Stores, DirectToConsumer, Amazon Attribution, etc).

ProgramEligibilityV2RequestContent.description: A request to evaluate account level eligibility for Amazon ad programs (Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, Sponsored Display, Stores, DirectToConsumer, Amazon Attribution, etc).

nextToken.description: The pagination token that is required to go to the next page

ProductEligibilityRequest.description: A product advertising eligibility request object.

adType.description: Set to 'sp' to check product eligibility for Sponsored Products advertisements. Set to 'sb' to check product eligibility for Sponsored Brands advertisements. Set to 'sd' to check product eligibility for Sponsored Displays advertisements. Set to 'dsp' to check product eligibility for Demand Side Platform advertisements.

productDetailsList.description: A list of product identifier objects.

locale.description: Set to the locale string in the table below to specify the language in which the response is returned

code.description: The HTTP status code of the response.

details.description: A human-readable description of the response.

EligibilityStatusMap.description: This is a map that will be key'd on the ad program (SB/SD/DTC/MAAS/SPOT); the value will be an eligibility object.

EligibilityStatusDetailV2.description: Describes a single program's eligibility status

eligible.description: Boolean value where if true, advertiser is eligible to access the given program.

Resource.description: The advertising resource of which you wish to check feature access for. Example: Sponsored Display Campaign.

details.description: A human-readable description of the response.

eligibilityStatusList.description: This is a map that will be key'd on the ad program (SB/SD/DTC/MAAS/SPOT); the value will be an eligibility object.

catalogSourceCountryCode.description: Country code of source marketplace where seller has listed the product. Possible source country codes include US, UK, DE, JP, and AE.

details.description: A human-readable description of the response.

overallStatus.description: A human-readable description of the product's advertising eligibility status. Inherits highest severity from eligibilityStatusList.

CountryProductDetailsMap.description: A country code, in the ISO 3166-1 for example US for USA alpha-2 format, and the county's corresponding product identifiers list.

FeatureEligibilityResponseContent.description: A list of feature eligibility responses for an advertiser, split by success and error

failureCode.description: Error identification string code - BAD_REQUEST, INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR, NOT_FOUND, FORBIDDEN, NOT_AUTHORIZED.

CountryProductResponse.description: A country and the county's corresponding product identifiers list with advertising eligibility response.
